>
[Ring of Lies](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3104)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 294 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 850 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This plain silver ring has an almost oily sheen. While wearing the ring, you gain a +2 item bonus to Deception checks. 

**Activate—Sweeten Lies** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** Snapping your fingers on the hand that wears the ring causes the ring to cast [_honeyed words_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1558) on you with no visual manifestations of a spell being cast.
